welcome.title: Welcome aboard!
welcome.description: Murmure use default microphone to record your voice.

wpmTooltip.line1: Your average words per minute with Murmure this month.
wpmTooltip.line2: A fast keyboard user usually types around 80 words per minute. You can speak much faster.

wordsTooltip.line1: Total words written with Murmure this month.
wordsTooltip.line2: Thatâ€™s thousands of ideas turned into text, without typing a single key.

dataTooltip.line1: Data processed locally instead of being sent to the Cloud this month.
dataTooltip.line2: Murmure removes all audio files after processing and only keeps your five latest transcriptions, stored locally on your device.
